lead_paragraph: FELDMAN--Mark K.,July 21, 2016. Beloved husband of Patti. Devoted father to Ali, Meg and Dan. Cherished son of Louise and the late Fred. Loving brother to Arlee and Rich Weiss, Jackie and Andy Aaron. Affectionate uncle and friend. Services Sunday, July 24, 2016 at The Community Synagogue of Sands Point, 160 Middle Neck Road, Sands Point, New York. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FELDMAN, MARK K.
